column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Two days later I returned for breakfast with the same collegue
column3: I was off work due to some friends coming into town out of state.  They wanted to tour the city before they departed to go home
column4: so we popped in for breakfast.  Somehow
column5: we were given time to order
column7: staff was at our table every 30 seconds to rush us out of there.  My friend couldn't even keep her glass of soda due to a hand from a resturant staffer snatching it away.  It didn't matter if we were finished or not
column9: asking us over and over again if we were done
column10: stealing whatever empty dishes they could find.
